pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Open-Source Free Cross-platform Multi-protocol VPN Program, as an academic project from University of Tsukuba. SoftEther VPN runs on Windows, Linux, Mac, FreeBSD and Solaris. SoftEther VPN supports most of widely-used VPN protocols including SSL-VPN, OpenVPN, IPsec, L2TP, MS-SSTP, L2TPv3 and EtherIP.

use.flag: Enable install of SoftEther VPN bridge
Enable install of SoftEther VPN client
Enable install of SoftEther VPN cmd
Enable install of SoftEther VPN server
